DOC.HEADLINE: TOPICS / BRIEFLY ; ARTS : EXHIBIT FOCUSES ON VENICE
DOC.TEXT: The Venice Arts Mecca , a nonprofit community arts group that offers free workshops to low-income Venice youths , plans to exhibit participants ' work_on Saturday . The show , " Venice Through Our Eyes , " will feature the work of artists ages 6 to 22 who , under the guidance of local artists , have produced paintings , drawings , collage , black-and-white photographs and ceramic pieces . The exhibit will include a buffet and music by local jazz vocalist Dante Chambers , among others . It will be from 6 to 9 p.m. at 200 Westminster Ave . Visitors are asked to make a $ 10 donation at the door .
